info.title: Bank
info.description:
This service is successor of Bank service versions 1 and 2, that were used to ensure bank address data harmonization. 
These old versions are now deprecated and should no longer be used.
 
Data managed by this service consists of three entities:
 
**Bank** contains basic bank identifiers like Bank Number, BIC/SWIFT code, Bank Name and Bank Branch.
**Bank Address** contains standard address fields describing default Bank Address.
**BankScriptedAddress** contains international versions of the address. Each version is identified by Address Representation Code.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read and update bank master data using this synchronous inbound service

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Bank HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
